generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with white lane markings, clearly designated for vehicular traffic.
- sidewalk: The area with textured paving stones and a curb on the left side of the image is a designated pedestrian walkway.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and a sign reading "HOTEL GARNI" is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a cloudy sky with some patches of blue visible.
- person: Two women are visible walking across the road in the foreground, and other pedestrians are visible in the background.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan on the left side and a white car further ahead.
- bus: A blue and white bus is visible in the distance, approaching the intersection.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing left is visible in the middle distance.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a tall pole with a traffic light and a sign pole on the right side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, near the pedestrian crossing.
